meanings.sent1: The giddying heights of the roller coaster made her feel dizzy.
meanings.sent2: The spinning teacup ride was giddying but fun.
meanings.sent3: The giddying merry-go-round made her head spin in a silly way.
meanings.sent4: The giddying sensation of falling in love was like a whirlwind.
meanings.sent5: The giddying sensation of being on a swing at its highest point was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Making someone feel excited or exhilarated.
meanings.sent1: The surprise party was a giddying experience for her.
meanings.sent2: The thrilling movie had a giddying effect on the audience.
meanings.sent3: The giddying news of winning the lottery left him jumping with joy.
meanings.sent4: The giddying feeling of accomplishment was like reaching the mountain top.
meanings.sent5: The giddying feeling of success was like fireworks in her heart.
